argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recosval | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` A ) = ( Re ` ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_axicn | |- _i e. CC |
| 3 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. RR -> ( _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( ( _i x. A ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_recld | |- ( A e. RR -> ( Re ` ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` A ) e. RR ) |
